short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize how much each person is talking in Google Meet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you talking too much in meetings? Do you think other people are? This extension displays a bar chart comparison of the share of talking during a Google Meet.

Features: 
* Highlight people who are talking more than an equal share
* Visualize overused business jargon
